title: Update Dashboard manual check-in button label

requirements.summary: Change the Dashboard manual check-in CTA button label to display exactly “CHECK IN”.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Dashboard page, the manual check-in button text reads exactly “CHECK IN”.
The button no longer contains the words “START” or “START CHECK IN” anywhere in its visible label.

file_operations.description: Update the manual check-in <Button> visible label text from "Start Check-In" to exactly "CHECK IN" without changing styling, layout, icons, or check-in flow logic.
